```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(scatterbar)
data("deconProp")
data("pos")

plot(pos)
head(deconProp)

scatterbar::create_scatterbar(deconProp, pos)
```

```{r shiftorder}
# change the order of the bar by changing the order in prop matrix
# combine with other ggplot geoms and customizations
library(ggplot2)
scatterbar::create_scatterbar(deconProp[, c(2,3,4,5,6,7,8,1)], pos, x_scale = 1, y_scale = 1, padding_x = 0.1, padding_y = 0.1) + 
  geom_point(data=pos, mapping=aes(x=x, y=y)) +
  theme_bw() + ylab('y') 
```
